content: materials a rectangular colorblock bias blanket uses 12 19 skeins of purl soho yarn - yarn a 1 2 skein s of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards approximately 218 436 yards required - yarn b 1 1 skein of purl soho s linen quill 2 50% fine highland wool 35% alpaca and 15% linen each skein is 439 yards approximately 220 439 yards required - yarn c 1 2 skein s of purl soho s worsted twist 3 100% merino wool each skein is 164 yards approximately 164 328 yards required - yarn d 1 2 skein s of season alpaca approximately 218 436 yards required - yarn e 1 1 skein of linen quill approximately 220 439 yards required - yarn f 1 2 skein s of season alpaca approximately 218 436 yards required - yarn g 1 1 skein of linen quill approximately 220 439 yards required - yarn h 1 2 skein s of purl soho s cashmere merino bloom 4 75% extra fine merino and 25% cashmere each skein is 218 yards approximately 218 436 yards required - yarn i 1 1 skein of purl soho s line weight 5 100% merino wool each skein is 494 yards approximately 247 494 yards required - yarn j 1 2 skein s of worsted twist approximately 164 328 yards required - yarn k 1 2 skeins s of purl soho s mulberry merino 6 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% silk each skein is 247 yards approximately 218 436 yards required - yarn l 1 1 skein of linen quill approximately 220 439 yards required you ll also need… - us 7 4 5 mm 32- or 40-inch circular needles 8 note previous versions of this blanket used a different combination of yarns including purl soho s flax down 9 and alpaca pure 10 both no longer available for more on those versions click here 11 and here 12 gauge - 19 stitches and 40 row = 4 inches in garter stitch in every yarn combination unblocked - 18 stitches and 36 row = 4 inches in garter stitch in every yarn combination blocked size crib throw size - unblocked dimensions approximately 29½ wide x 43½ inches long 42 inches wide x 64 inches long - finished dimensions approximately 31 inches wide x 46 inches long 44 inches wide x 67 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/linen-quill html 3 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist html 4 https //www purlsoho com/cashmere-merino-bloom html 5 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 6 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 7 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 8 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 9 https //www purlsoho com/flax-down html 10 https //www purlsoho com/alpaca-pure 11 https //www purlsoho com/create/2015/09/04/rectangular-colorblock-bias-blanket/ 12 https //www purlsoho com/create/2016/10/07/rectangular-colorblock-bias-blanket-in-new-colors/
